content: 2/16 _ there is now a spanish translation of beatnik 1 approved with the permission of knitty and approved by me instruction for knitting flat as the original and in the round the pattern has been translated and tested by lilithmoonshield 2 mercuemar 3 and nurisuki 4 from the group knitting dreams 5 thanks to all involved 1 https //knittingdreamsblog wordpress com/portfolio/challenge-febrero/ 2 http //www ravelry com/people/lilithmoonshield 3 http //www ravelry com/people/mercuemar 4 http //www ravelry com/people/nurisuki 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/knitting-dreams
